text: "If You Don't Want My Love" is a song by Robert John from 1968. It became a hit in the U.S. (Billboard #49, Cash Box #34) and the UK (#42). It did best in Canada, where it reached #21. The song was written and performed with Michael Gately, as was the B-side of the single, "Don't". "If You Don't Want My Love" was the first charting hit of John's adult career.
